item.title: Odilia Version 0.1.0 Released
item.description: After many months—just over a year of hard work, we are proud to announce the initial, beta release of Odilia: a new, fast, lightweight, screenreader for Linux. Thanks to all the others who have been instrumental in making Odilia possible: @albertotirla (BGTLover) @mcb2003 (Fake VIP) @luukvanderduim (Luuk Van Der Duim) @samtay (Sam Tay) Federico Mena and Emmanuel Bassi at GNOME for answering my questions. @lparcq (Laurent Pelecq) on Gitlab for the creation of a speech library.
